name: regular-devtools
description: Regular Developer Tools is a Chrome Extension that allows real-time inspection of [Regular](http://regularjs.github.io/) components.

scripts.build: npm run devtool-build && npm run inject-build
scripts.devtool-build: bili src/devtools/devtools.js --out-dir dist --name devtools.bundle --format umd --exports none
scripts.inject-build: bili src/frontend/inject.js --out-dir dist --name inject.bundle --format umd --exports none
